entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 7. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending this evening then clearing. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
